mapper.sql: id, project_name, `type`, protect_unit, apply_unit, remark, category, create_time
mapper.select:
select id, project_name, type, protect_unit, apply_unit,remark,category,create_time, area_name from project
and project_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

select id, project_name, type, protect_unit, apply_unit,remark,category,create_time, area_name from project
and project_name = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into project (project_name, `type`, protect_unit, apply_unit, remark, category, create_time, area_name) values (#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protectUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{areaName})

insert into project
project_name,
`type`,
protect_unit,
apply_unit,
remark,
category,
create_time,
#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{protectUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
protect_unit = #{protectUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_unit = #{applyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protect_unit = #{protectUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_unit = #{applyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
